name: Butch: Hard Guy
overview: The object of the game is to guide 'BUTCH HARD GUY' through 20 hazardous screens of danger. You must free forgotten and now imprisoned ex army war vet's which have been captured and are now held captive by the notorious villain 'THE EVIL DR. TIE FU'. Your mission as 'BUTCH HARD GUY' the meanest toughest war veteran that ever lived is fraught with danger... can you survive it...
